
---
title: '首发价 649 元起，小米 Redmi 10A 发布：5000mAh 大电池，6.53 英寸水滴屏'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/3/814130f8-072c-489e-9fb7-464c950956d1.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Mon, 28 Mar 2022 13:27:00 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/3/814130f8-072c-489e-9fb7-464c950956d1.png'
---

<div>   
<div class="tougao-user">感谢IT之家网友 <a href="https://m.ithome.com/html/app/open.html?url=ithome%3A%2F%2Fuserpage%3Fid%3D1100287" rel="nofollow">异鬼</a>、<a href="https://m.ithome.com/html/app/open.html?url=ithome%3A%2F%2Fuserpage%3Fid%3D1788600" rel="nofollow">普莱是袋熊</a> 的线索投递！</div>
            <p data-vmark="83a1"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 3 月 28 日消息，小米 Redmi 10A 今日正式发布，配备 6.53 英寸屏幕，以及 5000mAh 大电池，<span class="accentTextColor">首发价 649 元起</span>。</p><p data-vmark="8aa6" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/3/814130f8-072c-489e-9fb7-464c950956d1.png" w="1440" h="639" title="首发价 649 元起，小米 Redmi 10A 发布：5000mAh 大电池，6.53 英寸水滴屏" width="1440" height="364" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="ae92">小米 Redmi 10A 拥有三款配色，配备后置指纹识别，重量 194g，厚度 9mm，配备<span class="accentTextColor">联发科 Helio G25</span> 处理器，拥有 4GB+64GB / 4GB+128GB / 6GB+128GB 存储选项，支持最高 512GB 的可扩展存储。</p><p data-vmark="9fb6" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/3/8e59334e-da5b-4157-b706-18ae53300951.png" w="515" h="515" title="首发价 649 元起，小米 Redmi 10A 发布：5000mAh 大电池，6.53 英寸水滴屏" width="515" height="515" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="7b83">该机采用 <span class="accentTextColor">6.53 英寸 1600 X 720 屏幕</span>，屏幕比例 20:9，最高亮度 400 nit，拥有 5000mAh 大电池，标配 5V2A 充电器。</p><p data-vmark="8dc7" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/3/cd9dd29a-fe9b-48a6-8ff6-3ed27a72805c.png" w="1281" h="788" title="首发价 649 元起，小米 Redmi 10A 发布：5000mAh 大电池，6.53 英寸水滴屏" width="1281" height="504" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="8fa0">影像方面，该机后置 1300 万像素镜头，前置 500 万像素镜头。此外，该机支持<span class="accentTextColor">双卡 4G</span>，配备蓝牙 5.0，以及 3.5mm 耳机孔，预装 MIUI 12.5 操作系统，采用 <span class="accentTextColor">Micro USB 接口</span>。</p><p data-vmark="b909" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/3/fbb5b75a-df72-4a4a-904a-f09989610ca7.png" w="1440" h="667" title="首发价 649 元起，小米 Redmi 10A 发布：5000mAh 大电池，6.53 英寸水滴屏" width="1440" height="380" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="c7b5">IT之家了解到，小米 Redmi 10A 的售价为：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p data-vmark="bda2">4GB + 64GB：649 元（原价 699 元）</p></li><li><p data-vmark="d585">4GB + 128GB：799 元</p></li><li><p data-vmark="bb5a">6GB + 128GB：899 元</p></li></ul><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=/pages/union/proxy/proxy?spreadUrl=https%3a%2f%2funion-click.jd.com%2fjdc%3fe%3d%26p%&EA_PTAG=17078.27.380" data-jdid="100020530719"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/129117/24/25846/223880/62405685Ea1eb33ca/cf198eb8303bb230.jpg" title="首发价 649 元起，小米 Redmi 10A 发布：5000mAh 大电池，6.53 英寸水滴屏" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name"> Redmi 10A 6GB+128GB 暗影黑</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price"> 899 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir>
          
</div>
